member.name: T:Xceed.Wpf.DataGrid.Views.CardflowView3DSurfaces
member.summary: Value that represents the various surfaces that are supported by the Cardflow 3D view.

member.name: F:Xceed.Wpf.DataGrid.Views.CardflowView3DSurfaces.Left
member.summary: The surface displayed on all cards located to the left of the center card.

member.name: F:Xceed.Wpf.DataGrid.Views.CardflowView3DSurfaces.Center
member.summary: The surface displayed on the front of the center card.

member.name: F:Xceed.Wpf.DataGrid.Views.CardflowView3DSurfaces.Right
member.summary: The surface displayed on all cards located to the right of the center card.

member.name: F:Xceed.Wpf.DataGrid.Views.CardflowView3DSurfaces.Back
member.summary: The surface displayed on the back of the center card.

member.name: F:Xceed.Wpf.DataGrid.Views.CardflowView3DSurfaces.All
member.summary: All surfaces.

member.name: T:Xceed.Wpf.DataGrid.Views.ChameleonTitleRegionOrientation
member.summary: Value representing the various title-region orientations supported by the Chameleon theme.

member.name: F:Xceed.Wpf.DataGrid.Views.ChameleonTitleRegionOrientation.Upward
member.summary: The title-region is upward.

member.name: F:Xceed.Wpf.DataGrid.Views.ChameleonTitleRegionOrientation.Downward
member.summary: The title-region is downward.

member.name: T:Xceed.Wpf.DataGrid.Views.ChameleonTitleRegionPosition
member.summary: Value representing the various title-region positions supported by the Chameleon theme (see Remarks).

member.name: F:Xceed.Wpf.DataGrid.Views.ChameleonTitleRegionPosition.Left
member.summary: The title-region is positioned at the left of the surface.

member.name: F:Xceed.Wpf.DataGrid.Views.ChameleonTitleRegionPosition.Right
member.summary: The title-region is positioned at the right of the surface.

member.name: T:Xceed.Wpf.DataGrid.Views.ElementalTitleRegionPosition
member.summary: Value representing the various title-region positions supported by the Elemental themes (see Remarks).

member.name: F:Xceed.Wpf.DataGrid.Views.ElementalTitleRegionPosition.Top
member.summary: The title-region is positioned at the top of the surface.

member.name: F:Xceed.Wpf.DataGrid.Views.ElementalTitleRegionPosition.Middle
member.summary: The title-region is positioned in the middle of the surface.

member.name: F:Xceed.Wpf.DataGrid.Views.ElementalTitleRegionPosition.Bottom
member.summary: The title-region is positioned at the bottom of the surface.

summary.para: Class used in DataGridControl templates as a replacement for the ItemsPresenter when a grid is in a cardflow-view layout and that will contain the data items as well as the items contained in non-fixed header and footer sections and whose containers are created from the associated CustomItemContainerGenerator.

member.name: T:Xceed.Wpf.DataGrid.Views.CardflowView3D
T:Xceed.Wpf.DataGrid.Views.ChameleonTheme
member.summary: Represents the Chameleon theme, which is a two-tone theme that provides full control over its gradient color scheme.

member.name: T:Xceed.Wpf.DataGrid.Views.ElementalBlackTheme
member.summary: Represents the Elemental Black theme, which is a basic black theme that was designed to blend perfectly with the black Office 2007 theme.

member.name: T:Xceed.Wpf.DataGrid.Views.ElementalBlueTheme
member.summary: Represents the Elemental Blue theme, which is a basic blue theme that was designed to blend perfectly with the blue Office 2007 theme.

member.name: T:Xceed.Wpf.DataGrid.Views.ElementalSilverTheme
member.summary: Represents the Elemental Silver theme, which is a basic silver theme that was designed to blend perfectly with the silver Office 2007 theme.

member.name: M:Xceed.Wpf.DataGrid.Views.CardflowItemsHost.ArrangeOverride(System.Windows.Size)
member.summary: Arranges the content of the items.

param.name: finalSize
param.para: The final area within the parent that this element should use to arrange itself and its children.

member.name: M:Xceed.Wpf.DataGrid.Views.CardflowItemsHost.CreateChildCollection
member.summary: Creates an empty list of UIElements that will contain the containers that are generated for data items and items contained in non-fixed header and footer sections.
member.returns: An empty IList<UIElement> collection that will contain the containers that are generated for data items and items contained in the non-fixed header and footer sections.

member.name: M:Xceed.Wpf.DataGrid.Views.CardflowItemsHost.InvalidateScrollInfo
member.summary: Called by an IScrollInfo interface that is attached to a ScrollViewer when the value of any scrolling property size changes.

member.name: M:Xceed.Wpf.DataGrid.Views.CardflowItemsHost.MeasureOverride(System.Windows.Size)
member.summary: Measures the child elements in anticipation of arranging them during the ArrangeOverride pass
member.returns: The Size that represents the desired size of the element.

member.name: M:Xceed.Wpf.DataGrid.Views.CardflowItemsHost.OnReceiveWeakEvent(System.Type,System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Invoked whenever a WeakEventManager delivers the event being managed by the class.

member.name: M:Xceed.Wpf.DataGrid.Views.CardflowItemsHost.ScrollByOffset(System.Int32)
member.summary: Scrolls by the specified offset.
member.param: The offset, in card widths, by which to scroll. Can be negative to scroll to the left, and positive to scroll to the right.

member.name: M:Xceed.Wpf.DataGrid.Views.CardflowItemsHost.ScrollToIndex(System.Int32)
member.summary: Scrolls to the specified index.
member.param: The zero-based index to which to scroll.

member.summary: Gets or sets the offset of the camera from the center of the viewport on the X axis.

member.name: P:Xceed.Wpf.DataGrid.Views.CardflowView3D.CameraLooksAtOriginOnX
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the camera looks at the X origin when it moves along the X axis (see Remarks).

member.name: P:Xceed.Wpf.DataGrid.Views.CardflowView3D.CameraLooksAtOriginOnY
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the camera looks at the Y origin when it moves along the Y axis (see Remarks).

member.name: P:Xceed.Wpf.DataGrid.Views.CardflowView3D.CameraRevolutionXAngle
member.summary: Gets or sets the angle of the camera as it revolves on the X-axis.

member.name: P:Xceed.Wpf.DataGrid.Views.CardflowView3D.CameraRevolutionYAngle
member.summary: Gets or sets the angle of the camera as it revolves on the Y-axis.

member.name: P:Xceed.Wpf.DataGrid.Views.CardflowView3D.CameraXOffset
member.summary: Gets or sets the X-axis offset of the camera from the middle of the center card.

member.name: P:Xceed.Wpf.DataGrid.Views.CardflowView3D.CameraYOffset
member.summary: Gets or sets the Y-axis offset of the camera from the middle of the center card.

member.name: P:Xceed.Wpf.DataGrid.Views.CardflowView3D.CameraZOffset
member.summary: Gets or sets the Z-axis offset of the camera from the middle of the center card.

member.name: P:Xceed.Wpf.DataGrid.Views.CardflowView3D.CardHeightToViewportRatio
member.summary: Gets or sets the physical card size relative to the height of the viewport.

member.name: P:Xceed.Wpf.DataGrid.Views.CardflowView3D.CenterCardXAngle
member.summary: Gets or sets the X-axis angle of the center card (see Remarks).

member.name: P:Xceed.Wpf.DataGrid.Views.CardflowView3D.CenterCardYAngle
member.summary: Gets or sets the Y-axis angle of the center card (see Remarks).

member.name: P:Xceed.Wpf.DataGrid.Views.CardflowView3D.EmptySurfaceBrush
member.summary: Gets or sets the brush that is applied to cards that currently do not display a surface.

member.name: P:Xceed.Wpf.DataGrid.Views.CardflowView3D.FieldOfView
member.summary: Gets or sets the camera's horizontal field of view.

member.name: P:Xceed.Wpf.DataGrid.Views.CardflowView3D.IsCardFlippingEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the center card can be flipped to show its back surface.

member.name: P:Xceed.Wpf.DataGrid.Views.CardflowView3D.ShowReflections
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether card reflections are shown.

member.name: P:Xceed.Wpf.DataGrid.Views.CardflowView3D.SideCardsCount
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of cards on each side of the center card on which surfaces are displayed.

member.name: P:Xceed.Wpf.DataGrid.Views.CardflowView3D.SideCardsXAngle
member.summary: Gets or sets the X-axis angle of the cards located to either side of the center card (see Remarks).

member.name: P:Xceed.Wpf.DataGrid.Views.CardflowView3D.SideCardsXOffset
member.summary: Gets or sets the X-axis offset of the cards located to either side of the center card, measured from the middle of the center card (see Remarks).

member.name: P:Xceed.Wpf.DataGrid.Views.CardflowView3D.SideCardsXSpacing
member.summary: Gets or sets the X-axis spacing between the cards located to either side of the center card.

member.name: P:Xceed.Wpf.DataGrid.Views.CardflowView3D.SideCardsYAngle
member.summary: Gets or sets the Y-axis angle of the cards located to either side of the center card (see Remarks).

member.name: P:Xceed.Wpf.DataGrid.Views.CardflowView3D.SideCardsZOffset
member.summary: Gets or sets the Z-axis offset of the cards located to either side of the center card, measured from the middle of the center card.

member.summary: Gets or sets the Z-axis spacing between the cards located to either side of the center card.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ChameleonTheme class.

member.name: M:Xceed.Wpf.DataGrid.Views.ChameleonTheme.GetGradientDarkColor(System.Windows.DependencyObject)
member.summary: Gets the bottom (dark) color that will be used to create the gradient scheme.
member.returns: A Color representing the bottom (dark) color that will be used to create the gradient scheme. See Remarks for default appearance.

item.description: The dependency object from which the property value is read.

member.name: M:Xceed.Wpf.DataGrid.Views.ChameleonTheme.GetGradientLightColor(System.Windows.DependencyObject)
member.summary: Gets the top (light) color that will be used to create the gradient scheme.
member.returns: A Color representing the top (light) color that will be used to create the gradient scheme. See Remarks for default appearance.

item.description: The dependency object from which the property value is read.

member.name: M:Xceed.Wpf.DataGrid.Views.ChameleonTheme.GetTitleRegionOrientation(System.Windows.DependencyObject)
member.summary: Gets a value representing the orientation of the title region.
member.returns: A ChameleonTitleRegionOrientation value representing the orientation of the title region. By default, ChameleonTitleRegionOrientation.Upward for the cards located to the left of the center card and ChameleonTitleRegionOrientation.Downward for the cards located to the right.

item.description: The dependency object from which the property value is read.

member.name: M:Xceed.Wpf.DataGrid.Views.ChameleonTheme.GetTitleRegionPosition(System.Windows.DependencyObject)
member.summary: Gets a value representing the position of the title region on a surface (see Remarks).
member.returns: A ChameleonTitleRegionPosition value representing the position of the title region on a surface.

item.description: The dependency object from which the property value is read.
